nodes.speaker: first_officer_torres
nodes.text: LZ is hot. Air's thick, can't see more than 50 meters. The ruin entrance is 300 meters east, but this jungle feels... watchful.

choices.text: [Reconnaissance] "Let's scout the area. I don't like surprises."
"We stick to the mission. Straight to the ruins, single file."
[Previous Loop] "The direct path is a nesting ground. We take the ridge to the north. It's longer, but safer."

nodes.speaker: science_officer_kim
nodes.text: Scouting protocols active. I'm picking up anomalous flora and some very large bio-signatures. What's our focus?

choices.text: Examine those tracks by the creek.
Triangulate that clicking sound from the canopy.

nodes.speaker: first_officer_torres
nodes.text: Three-toed, heavy, clawed. These aren't herbivores. And they're fresh. They're stalking the path to the ruins.

nodes.speaker: first_officer_torres
nodes.text: Can't get a clear print, the ground is too soft. Could be anything.

nodes.speaker: science_officer_kim
nodes.text: Fascinating! The plant's pulsation is a defense mechanism. It emits a neurotoxin. I can synthesize a counter-agent that might work as a repellent.

nodes.speaker: science_officer_kim
nodes.text: The plant just released a cloud of spores! Everyone, masks on! I... I think I got a mild dose. My hands are numb.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: As you focus on the sound, it suddenly stops. An unnerving silence descends on the jungle. You feel a dozen unseen eyes turn towards you.

nodes.speaker: first_officer_torres
nodes.text: Scouting complete, Captain. We have our path.

choices.text: Stick to the direct route. We're prepared now.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You proceed directly towards the ruins.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You take the safer, longer path along the ridge.
